content.h1: Integrating Sooda with external configuration mechanisms
content.p: Sooda lets you do this. Just create a class that implements Sooda.Config.ISoodaConfigProvider and tell Sooda to use it. The easiest way is to put the full name of the type in App.config in sooda.config parameter.:

An alternative would be to attach the SoodaConfigAttribute to your entry assembly (*.exe): and specifying the ProviderType. Note that this doesn't work with web applications because they don't have the entry assembly defined.
